newsitem.title: UK: NWE straight-run fuel oil - crude gives support.
newsitem.headline: NWE straight-run fuel oil - crude gives support.

text.p: Low sulphur straight run was a touch firmer on the back of strengthening crude, but potential buyers pointed to its recent volatility.
Sellers, however said there was no overhang and low sulphur cargoes should be able to secure $125 fob NWE, or a touch higher.

The high sulphur straight run market continued to tick over discreetly with formula +$5-6 talked for E-4 cargoes. Brokers said three to four straight run Russian cargoes were loading over the next five days.
